name: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
desc: The supported joint names for the hand pose.

items.name: static let thumbTip: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The tip of the thumb.

items.name: static let thumbIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The thumb’s interphalangeal (IP) joint.

items.name: static let thumbMP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The thumb’s metacarpophalangeal (MP) joint.

items.name: static let thumbCMC: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The thumb’s carpometacarpal (CMC) joint.

items.name: static let indexTip: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The tip of the index finger.

items.name: static let indexDIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The index finger’s distal interphalangeal (DIP) joint.

items.name: static let indexPIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The index finger’s proximal interphalangeal (PIP) joint.

items.name: static let indexMCP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The index finger’s metacarpophalangeal (MCP) joint.

items.name: static let middleTip: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The tip of the middle finger.

items.name: static let middleDIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The middle finger’s distal interphalangeal (DIP) joint.

items.name: static let middlePIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The middle finger’s proximal interphalangeal (PIP) joint.

items.name: static let middleMCP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The middle finger’s metacarpophalangeal (MCP) joint.

items.name: static let ringTip: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The tip of the ring finger.

items.name: static let ringDIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The ring finger’s distal interphalangeal (DIP) joint.

items.name: static let ringPIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The ring finger’s proximal interphalangeal (PIP) joint.

items.name: static let ringMCP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The ring finger’s metacarpophalangeal (MCP) joint.

items.name: static let littleTip: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The tip of the little finger.

items.name: static let littleDIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The little finger’s distal interphalangeal (DIP) joint.

items.name: static let littlePIP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The little finger’s proximal interphalangeal (PIP) joint.

items.name: static let littleMCP: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The little finger’s metacarpophalangeal (MCP) joint.

items.name: static let wrist: VNHumanHandPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The wrist.

items.name: init(rawValue: VNRecognizedPointKey)
items.desc: Creates a joint name with a recognized point key.
